text:
Good news! New survey data @leger360 shows 
willingness to take the first (#COVID19) #vaccine available has ↑ since Nov 30 - in both 🇨🇦 & 🇺🇸 [red lines] 

For 🇨🇦, total “willingness to accept a vaccine” has ↑ to 77% (Jan 4), up from 70% (Nov 16) [red+grey lines]

@ImmunizedotCa https://t.co/qGHJZunixs
